name: Treasure Labs LOOT
description: The ecosystem of Treasure Labs is powered by $LOOT tokens. What is Treasure Labs? Treasure Labs is a Web3 gaming ecosystem to benefit players, creators and investors. By using the power of innovative combination of Blockchain, SDKs, mobile apps, and NFTs, our full scale ecosystem provides a robust and sustainable platform into the hands of those playing and creating it. We aim to attract both gamers and creators. Creators will also have the tools to launch and monetize their own gaming creations on the platform. We are building an entire ecosystem for play-to-earn games, not just a single game.
